name: Andrélon Shampoo 2 in 1
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethiconol, Citrullus Lanatus Fruit (Meloen) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder (Aloë Vera), Isoleucine, Lysine HCl, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Citric Acid, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Sulfate, Cocamide MEA, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-6, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.
